root.description: OverviewÂ Battle Crusher is a fighting game published by Banpresto and released only in Japan in 1995. Battle Crusher features a single player progression mode and a two player versus mode. Battle Crusher features twelve different playable characters, including some characters from the Gundam and Ultraman franchises.
